about.title: About Us
about.homeSectionTitle: Because we know: Your dog is part of your family – and deserves only the best.
description: Welcome to AmanLux Dogs – your exclusive dog daycare and loving dog hotel in Zurich, where every dog is welcomed as a family member.

We don't just offer care – at AmanLux Dogs, your dog experiences a day full of love, security, and adventure. In our 220 square meter house with a lovingly designed garden, your four-legged friend has plenty of space to play, socialize, and explore.
Our work is based on trust, quality, and heart. With the official permit WHgH2021147 from the Veterinary Office, we guarantee the highest standards in safety and well-being.
At AmanLux Dogs, your dog is never alone – they are always in caring and experienced hands.
We pick up your dog directly from your home and bring them back safely after an eventful day full of attention and joy.
Because we know: Your dog is part of your family – and deserves only the best.

daycare.title: Daycare
daycare.description: We offer your four-legged best friend a unique experience full of joy, comfort, and care during the daycare day.

hotel.title: Overnight and Weekend
hotel.description:
When your dog stays with us overnight or on the weekend, we take loving care of everything.
We provide comfortable beds, cozy blankets, and toys – everything your dog needs for comfort and well-being is already there.
You don't need to bring anything – except your dog's usual food.
Because at AmanLux Dogs, everything is taken care of.

training.title: Dog Training
training.description:
Our training combines expertise, patience, and a lot of love.
Whether puppy or adult dog – we support you in building trust, communication, and good behavior.

taxi.title: Taxi Dog Service
taxi.description:
Our Taxi Dog Service in Zurich and the surrounding area is included in the price for daycare and the dog hotel.
We have two vehicles with fixed routes. Please note:
The service is not available on weekends and public holidays.
Please feel free to ask us if your address is on one of our routes.
We are happy to meet clients outside these areas at a central location in Zurich.
taxi.locationHint: Our location: Flaach, surrounded by nature – your dog will love it!
